Title: Valid Login with Email and Password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email address
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result: User successfully logs in and redirects to dashboard based on role

Title: Invalid Login with Wrong Password
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email address
3. Enter incorrect password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result: Login fails with error message 'Invalid credentials'
Remarks:
AUTH02 Exception: Locator expected to be visible
Actual value: <element(s) not found> 
Call log:
  - Expect "to_be_visible" with timeout 10000ms
  - waiting for get_by_role("button", name="Log-in")

Title: Invalid Login with Non-existent Email
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter non-existent email address
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result: Login fails with appropriate error message
Remarks:
AUTH03 Exception: Locator expected to be visible
Actual value: <element(s) not found> 
Call log:
  - Expect "to_be_visible" with timeout 10000ms
  - waiting for get_by_role("button", name="Log-in")

Title: Password Visibility Toggle
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter password in password field
3. Click eye icon to show password
4. Click eye icon again to hide password
Expected Result: Password visibility toggles correctly between hidden and visible

Title: UI Load Test
Expected Result: Login form displays with email/password fields and tabs
